Overview  Service   Command 

Service: zimbraAccount
Namespace: "urn:zimbraAccount"
DeleteSignature SOAP Command

Delete a signature

must specify either {name} or {id} attribute to <signature>

Authorization token required true
Admin Authorization token required false

DeleteSignatureRequest

    <DeleteSignatureRequest> ## DeleteSignatureRequest
        <signature [name="..."] [id="..."] /> ## NameId
    </DeleteSignatureRequest>

The following table describes elements and attributes you can define within a <DeleteSignatureRequest> element:

XPath Required / Optional Description
/signature Required (only 1) The signature to delete
/signature@name Optional (0 or 1) Type:String
Name
/signature@id Optional (0 or 1) Type:String
ID

DeleteSignatureResponse

    <DeleteSignatureResponse /> ## DeleteSignatureResponse
